features: Lightweight warmth: The PrimaLoft® Silver Active 140g duvet insulation is ultralight and extremely warm
Stretch Comfort: With lots of stretch and a longer fit that covers the hips, the jacket effortlessly moves with you as you speed down the slopes
Weather protection: Featuring 20k/20k fabric, the jacket keeps the wind and rain out, as well as being extremely breathable. PFC-free
